name: Note Taking Mobile App
description:
Hey Beautiful Friend,


Presenting you Notely: Note Taking iOS App


Notely is not just another standard note-taking app. It's an app made especially made in Kawaii style. Because I firmly believe that apps can be beautiful and cute while being usable and accessible simultaneously. And the Notely is living proof of that.


How It Achieved This Cuteness Level?

The rounded edges of the buttons with corner smoothing, the rounded fonts, and these doodle-style illustrations from the Craftwork's Nuts Illustration Pack helps it achieve this level of cuteness. And not to mention these pastel colors :)


What You Get In This Figma File?

In addition to lots of love, you will get:

  • Seven Cute iOS screens
  • Presentation Pack for the App
  • Some Secret Gifts


Enough Talking :)

Now it’s time for you to take an action, an action you’ll never regret, an action that’ll put a smile on your face. Go ahead, and click the ‘Duplicate’ button.


More Exclusive Freebies
